reviewText: Ok this was a good dvd espcilly if you like Sonic and christmas but here are some things you should be awere of before buying this dvd. First of all in the first epsoide everybody is shcoked to here that santa is retireing and is being replaced with Robnik clues and insted of pepole geting christmas presents it's the the other way around. When Sonic and Tails here the news they hurry to stop Scatch and Grounder who are takeing pepole stuff and giveing it to Dr.Robonik. Sonic and Tails meet up with a little boy in the streets and he tells them all about what Roboniks done. After Sonic goes and frees santa clues Sonic must pass 2 test to save christmas in time can he do it? The christmas epsoide was the best on the dvd but then heres the problem. The next 3 epsoides on the dvd are Sonic Underground epsoides wich is the worst Sonic T.V. series and the epsoides on this dvd where so stupid they made me laff so hard it made my lungs hurt. The first one is Three Hedgehogs and a baby where Manic and stupid green hedgehog picks up a robot baby that will explode in 24 hours and dystroy mobuis. A stupid story and it was funny when the baby blew up and Manic cried Ha Ha Ha Ha Ha. Next epsoide The price of freedom when Sonia gets tired of Sonic and Manic and goes of to see here friend Mindy and lurns about the time past about Roboniks history of crimes. A epsoide mostly for girls and is incrdbley wrong espcilly when Mindy and Sonia kiss lip to lip! Theres also a stupid bonus epsoide with no point. So anyway I just watch the christmas epsoide and leave the other epsoides alone. Only buy for the christmas epsoides and avoid the SU epsoides on the DVD.

reviewText: I use to watch Sonic back in the 90s and I let my son watch it once and he was hooked. He love Sonic. I read the reviews on this particular Christmas special. They fail to mention the other episodes. If you're a fan of the Sonic series, this is a must.

reviewerName: Kevin T. Rodriguez "The Movie Wizard.com Revi...
reviewText: This Christmas special of Sonic is based off of the not-so-much-of-a-hit "Adventures of Sonic The Hedgehog" TV show... (...) At one point in time DiC decided to make one last Sonic special for USA Network (Who has for a long time not been showing cartoons).  Not wanting to make a special based off one show over the other, they decided to mix them.  The result:  A world resembling "AoSH" with better animation (A VERY good thing), with better writting and action, and even some worthwhile charicters!The better charicters and writting comes from "SatAM's" side (By the way, Sally from "SatAM" in this movie is also from "SatAM"), while the action mixs from goofy to dramatic!  I don't think this is the best Sonic thing ever, but for once we actually have a good episode of "AoSH!"  Too bad the whole series couldn't at least be a "little" like this!
Title: N/A
